        $(document).ready(function () {
            if (window.hasOwnProperty('webkitSpeechRecognition') || window.hasOwnProperty('SpeechRecognition')) {
                $(".voiceSearchIcon").show();
                $(".searchBtn").hide();
            }
            else {
                $(".voiceSearchIcon").hide();
                $(".searchBtn").show();
            }
        });

    




        $(document).ready(function () {
            try {
                var hdrHt = $('.navigation').height();
                var pnlHt = $('.shareMediaControlWithoutMedia').height();
                var ttlHt = hdrHt + pnlHt;
                $(document).on('click','.goToNazmTrnslt', function () {
                    //$('.audioVedioMediaControlsExplanation').removeClass('audioVedioMediaControlsExplanationActive');
                    console.log('hi');
                    if ($('.showTranslation .t').hasClass('t')) {
                        $('html,body').animate({
                            scrollTop: $('.showTranslation .t').first().offset().top - ttlHt - 64
                        }, 1000);
                    }
                });

                $(document).on('click', '.goToNazmExplen', function () {
                    console.log();
                    //$('.audioVedioMediaControlsTranslation').removeClass('audioVedioMediaControlsTranslationActive');
                    $('.poemPageContentBody .e').toggleClass('showexplanation');
                    $('.audioVedioMediaControlsExplanation').toggleClass('audioVedioMediaControlsExplanationActive');

                    $('html,body').animate({
                        scrollTop: $('.e').offset().top - ttlHt - 64
                    }, 1000);
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }
            try {
                $("mark").each(function () {
                    var cwmVl = $(this).attr("cwm");
                        $(this).append('<span class="cwmTooltip">' + cwmVl + '</span>');
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }

        });

                s.parentNode.insertBefore(t, s)
            }(window, document, 'script',
                'https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');
            fbq('init', '1415782558565409');
            fbq('track', 'PageView');
        







            window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
            function gtag() { dataLayer.push(arguments); }
            gtag('js', new Date());
            gtag('config', 'AW-776429577');
        














क़ुर्बानी

        var userEvts = [];

        var bundleurls={lg:'https://rekhtacdn.azureedge.net/contents/lgmdsm_hi?v=-L5ep4634VcSL6cO2GzSlIvyjrmViR6aDK8zgbx3ccE1', md:'https://rekhtacdn.azureedge.net/contents/mdsm_hi?v=YGq8oZ0R2UEe3NRxJ58l95jUrad9OjnDFnUKoJcEdf01', sm:'https://rekhtacdn.azureedge.net/contents/sm_hi?v=tRW3OHrBaMEXVfRPRREqK8uO66nyNmFTwIsPaYWrHEY1' };

        var websiteId =1;
        var maxAccessForRegistration = '5';

    










                (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
                    i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r; i[r] = i[r] || function () {
                        (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
                    }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date(); a = s.createElement(o),
                        m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0]; a.async = 1; a.src = g; m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
                })(window, document, 'script', 'https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

                ga('send', 'pageview');

                    ga('set', 'userId', userId); // Set the user ID using signed-in user_id.
                    gtag('set', { 'user_id': userId }); // Set the user ID using signed-in user_id

30,000+ ग़ज़लों, 20,000+ शेर, 40,000+ ई-पुस्तकों में तलाश कीजिए

आपकी खोज और इनपुट पर आधारित क्विक-सुझाव



सभी परिणाम देखिए















Rekhta Foundation
Devoted to the preservation & promotion of Urdu









AAMOZISH
The best way to learn Urdu online









Sufinama
Online Treasure of Sufi and Sant Poetry









Qaafiya
Online Urdu poetry resource for aspiring young poets

        $(document).ready(function () {
            if (window.hasOwnProperty('webkitSpeechRecognition') || window.hasOwnProperty('SpeechRecognition')) {
                $(".voiceSearchIcon").show();
                $(".searchBtn").hide();
            }
            else {
                $(".voiceSearchIcon").hide();
                $(".searchBtn").show();
            }
        });

    




        $(document).ready(function () {
            try {
                var hdrHt = $('.navigation').height();
                var pnlHt = $('.shareMediaControlWithoutMedia').height();
                var ttlHt = hdrHt + pnlHt;
                $(document).on('click','.goToNazmTrnslt', function () {
                    //$('.audioVedioMediaControlsExplanation').removeClass('audioVedioMediaControlsExplanationActive');
                    console.log('hi');
                    if ($('.showTranslation .t').hasClass('t')) {
                        $('html,body').animate({
                            scrollTop: $('.showTranslation .t').first().offset().top - ttlHt - 64
                        }, 1000);
                    }
                });

                $(document).on('click', '.goToNazmExplen', function () {
                    console.log();
                    //$('.audioVedioMediaControlsTranslation').removeClass('audioVedioMediaControlsTranslationActive');
                    $('.poemPageContentBody .e').toggleClass('showexplanation');
                    $('.audioVedioMediaControlsExplanation').toggleClass('audioVedioMediaControlsExplanationActive');

                    $('html,body').animate({
                        scrollTop: $('.e').offset().top - ttlHt - 64
                    }, 1000);
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }
            try {
                $("mark").each(function () {
                    var cwmVl = $(this).attr("cwm");
                        $(this).append('<span class="cwmTooltip">' + cwmVl + '</span>');
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }

        });


        var pContentId = "cf4e838c-385e-4b17-b174-0e6899729f1b";
        var paraInfo = null;
        var fpMappings = null;
        var fpParaMappings = null;
        //todo:remove
		var firstParaInfo = "{\"P\":[{\"L\":[],\"T\":[],\"E\":[]}],\"CH\":\"\",\"CTH\":\"\",\"TT\":false}";
        var pgUrl = "https://www.rekhta.org/stories/qurbaani-premchand-stories?lang=hi";

        var isDefaultTranslation = false;
        var isContentAvailable = 'False';

        var isDefaultExplanation = 'false';
    








        /* <![CDATA[ */
        var google_conversion_id = 962755924;
        var google_custom_params = window.google_tag_params;
        var google_remarketing_only = true;
        /* ]]> */
    










            !function (f, b, e, v, n, t, s) {
                if (f.fbq) return; n = f.fbq = function () {
                    n.callMethod ?
                        n.callMethod.apply(n, arguments) : n.queue.push(arguments)
                };
                if (!f._fbq) f._fbq = n; n.push = n; n.loaded = !0; n.version = '2.0';
                n.queue = []; t = b.createElement(e); t.async = !0;
                t.src = v; s = b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];
                s.parentNode.insertBefore(t, s)
            }(window, document, 'script',
                'https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');
            fbq('init', '1415782558565409');
            fbq('track', 'PageView');
        







            window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
            function gtag() { dataLayer.push(arguments); }
            gtag('js', new Date());
            gtag('config', 'AW-776429577');

        var isDefaultTranslation = false;
        var isContentAvailable = 'False';

        var isDefaultExplanation = 'false';
    








        /* <![CDATA[ */
        var google_conversion_id = 962755924;
        var google_custom_params = window.google_tag_params;
        var google_remarketing_only = true;
        /* ]]> */
    










            !function (f, b, e, v, n, t, s) {
                if (f.fbq) return; n = f.fbq = function () {
                    n.callMethod ?
                        n.callMethod.apply(n, arguments) : n.queue.push(arguments)
                };
                if (!f._fbq) f._fbq = n; n.push = n; n.loaded = !0; n.version = '2.0';
                n.queue = []; t = b.createElement(e); t.async = !0;
                t.src = v; s = b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];
                s.parentNode.insertBefore(t, s)
            }(window, document, 'script',
                'https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');
            fbq('init', '1415782558565409');
            fbq('track', 'PageView');
        







            window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
            function gtag() { dataLayer.push(arguments); }
            gtag('js', new Date());
            gtag('config', 'AW-776429577');
        














आल्हा

        var userEvts = [];

       var requestPath ='/stories/aalha-premchand-stories';
        var lang=2;

        var cardsUrl = 'https://rekhtacards.azureedge.net';
        var bundleurls={lg:'https://rekhtacdn.azureedge.net/contents/lgmdsm_hi?v=-L5ep4634VcSL6cO2GzSlIvyjrmViR6aDK8zgbx3ccE1', md:'https://rekhtacdn.azureedge.net/contents/mdsm_hi?v=YGq8oZ0R2UEe3NRxJ58l95jUrad9OjnDFnUKoJcEdf01', sm:'https://rekhtacdn.azureedge.net/contents/sm_hi?v=tRW3OHrBaMEXVfRPRREqK8uO66nyNmFTwIsPaYWrHEY1' };
        var favAddText = 'अपने फ़ेवरेट में शामिल कीजिए';
        var favRemText = 'फेवरेट से हटाइए';
        var websiteId =1;
        var maxAccessForRegistration = '5';

    










                (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
                    i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r; i[r] = i[r] || function () {
                        (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
                    }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date(); a = s.createElement(o),
                        m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0]; a.async = 1; a.src = g; m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
                })(window, document, 'script', 'https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

                ga('create', 'UA-37442234-1', 'auto');
                ga('send', 'pageview');
                function setGAUser(userId) {
                    ga('set', 'userId', userId); // Set the user ID using signed-in user_id.
                    gtag('set', { 'user_id': userId }); // Set the user ID using signed-in user_id
                }

DONATE TO REKHTA












30,000+ ग़ज़लों, 20,000+ शेर, 40,000+ ई-पुस्तकों में तलाश कीजिए

आपकी खोज और इनपुट पर आधारित क्विक-सुझाव



सभी परिणाम देखिए















Rekhta Foundation
Devoted to the preservation & promotion of Urdu









AAMOZISH
The best way to learn Urdu online









Sufinama
Online Treasure of Sufi and Sant Poetry









Qaafiya
Online Urdu poetry resource for aspiring young poets

        $(document).ready(function () {
            if (window.hasOwnProperty('webkitSpeechRecognition') || window.hasOwnProperty('SpeechRecognition')) {
                $(".voiceSearchIcon").show();
                $(".searchBtn").hide();
            }
            else {
                $(".voiceSearchIcon").hide();
                $(".searchBtn").show();
            }
        });

    




        $(document).ready(function () {
            try {
                var hdrHt = $('.navigation').height();
                var pnlHt = $('.shareMediaControlWithoutMedia').height();
                var ttlHt = hdrHt + pnlHt;
                $(document).on('click','.goToNazmTrnslt', function () {
                    //$('.audioVedioMediaControlsExplanation').removeClass('audioVedioMediaControlsExplanationActive');
                    console.log('hi');
                    if ($('.showTranslation .t').hasClass('t')) {
                        $('html,body').animate({
                            scrollTop: $('.showTranslation .t').first().offset().top - ttlHt - 64
                        }, 1000);
                    }
                });

                $(document).on('click', '.goToNazmExplen', function () {
                    console.log();
                    //$('.audioVedioMediaControlsTranslation').removeClass('audioVedioMediaControlsTranslationActive');
                    $('.poemPageContentBody .e').toggleClass('showexplanation');
                    $('.audioVedioMediaControlsExplanation').toggleClass('audioVedioMediaControlsExplanationActive');

                    $('html,body').animate({
                        scrollTop: $('.e').offset().top - ttlHt - 64
                    }, 1000);
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }
            try {
                $("mark").each(function () {
                    var cwmVl = $(this).attr("cwm");
                        $(this).append('<span class="cwmTooltip">' + cwmVl + '</span>');
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }

        });


        var pContentId = "dfd89cb7-7a01-4088-8c4d-3158fa9bab31";
        var paraInfo = null;
        var fpMappings = null;
        var fpParaMappings = null;
        //todo:remove
		var firstParaInfo = "{\"P\":[{\"L\":[],\"T\":[],\"E\":[]}],\"CH\":\"\",\"CTH\":\"\",\"TT\":false}";
        var pgUrl = "https://www.rekhta.org/stories/aalha-premchand-stories?lang=hi";

        var isDefaultTranslation = false;
        var isContentAvailable = 'False';

        var isDefaultExplanation = 'false';
    








        /* <![CDATA[ */
        var google_conversion_id = 962755924;
        var google_custom_params = window.google_tag_params;
        var google_remarketing_only = true;
        /* ]]> */

                };

                $("mark").each(function () {
                    var cwmVl = $(this).attr("cwm");
                        $(this).append('<span class="cwmTooltip">' + cwmVl + '</span>');
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }

        });


        var pContentId = "b34944c4-5524-4459-a874-4a59450b085b";
        var paraInfo = null;
        var fpMappings = null;
        var fpParaMappings = null;
        //todo:remove
		var firstParaInfo = "{\"P\":[{\"L\":[],\"T\":[],\"E\":[]}],\"CH\":\"\",\"CTH\":\"\",\"TT\":false}";
        var pgUrl = "https://www.rekhta.org/stories/triya-charitr-premchand-stories?lang=hi";

        var isDefaultTranslation = false;
        var isContentAvailable = 'False';

        var isDefaultExplanation = 'false';
    








        /* <![CDATA[ */
        var google_conversion_id = 962755924;
        var google_custom_params = window.google_tag_params;
        var google_remarketing_only = true;
        /* ]]> */

                if (f.fbq) return; n = f.fbq = function () {
                    n.callMethod ?
                        n.callMethod.apply(n, arguments) : n.queue.push(arguments)
                };
                if (!f._fbq) f._fbq = n; n.push = n; n.loaded = !0; n.version = '2.0';
                n.queue = []; t = b.createElement(e); t.async = !0;
                t.src = v; s = b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];
                s.parentNode.insertBefore(t, s)
            }(window, document, 'script',
                'https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');
            fbq('init', '1415782558565409');

            function gtag() { dataLayer.push(arguments); }
            gtag('js', new Date());

हक़ की फ़ीक्र
























        var startDt = Date.now();
        var userEvts = [];
        var currentLanguage = '2';
        // init values
       var requestPath ='/stories/haq-ki-fikr-premchand-stories';
        var lang=2;
        var rWorld= 'https://world.rekhta.org';
        var cardsUrl = 'https://rekhtacards.azureedge.net';
        var bundleurls={lg:'https://rekhtacdn.azureedge.net/contents/lgmdsm_hi?v=-L5ep4634VcSL6cO2GzSlIvyjrmViR6aDK8zgbx3ccE1', md:'https://rekhtacdn.azureedge.net/contents/mdsm_hi?v=YGq8oZ0R2UEe3NRxJ58l95jUrad9OjnDFnUKoJcEdf01', sm:'https://rekhtacdn.azureedge.net/contents/sm_hi?v=tRW3OHrBaMEXVfRPRREqK8uO66nyNmFTwIsPaYWrHEY1' };
        var favAddText = 'अपने फ़ेवरेट में शामिल कीजिए';
        var favRemText = 'फेवरेट से हटाइए';
        var websiteId =1;
        var maxAccessForRegistration = '5';

    










                (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
                    i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r; i[r] = i[r] || function () {
                        (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
                    }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date(); a = s.createElement(o),
                        m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0]; a.async = 1; a.src = g; m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
                })(window, document, 'script', 'https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

                ga('create', 'UA-37442234-1', 'auto');
                ga('send', 'pageview');
                function setGAUser(userId) {
                    ga('set', 'userId', userId); // Set the user ID using signed-in user_id.
                    gtag('set', { 'user_id': userId }); // Set the user ID using signed-in user_id
                }

30,000+ ग़ज़लों, 20,000+ शेर, 40,000+ ई-पुस्तकों में तलाश कीजिए

आपकी खोज और इनपुट पर आधारित क्विक-सुझाव



सभी परिणाम देखिए















Rekhta Foundation
Devoted to the preservation & promotion of Urdu









AAMOZISH
The best way to learn Urdu online









Sufinama
Online Treasure of Sufi and Sant Poetry









Qaafiya
Online Urdu poetry resource for aspiring young poets

        $(document).ready(function () {
            if (window.hasOwnProperty('webkitSpeechRecognition') || window.hasOwnProperty('SpeechRecognition')) {
                $(".voiceSearchIcon").show();
                $(".searchBtn").hide();
            }
            else {
                $(".voiceSearchIcon").hide();
                $(".searchBtn").show();
            }
        });

    




        $(document).ready(function () {
            try {
                var hdrHt = $('.navigation').height();
                var pnlHt = $('.shareMediaControlWithoutMedia').height();
                var ttlHt = hdrHt + pnlHt;
                $(document).on('click','.goToNazmTrnslt', function () {
                    //$('.audioVedioMediaControlsExplanation').removeClass('audioVedioMediaControlsExplanationActive');
                    console.log('hi');
                    if ($('.showTranslation .t').hasClass('t')) {
                        $('html,body').animate({
                            scrollTop: $('.showTranslation .t').first().offset().top - ttlHt - 64
                        }, 1000);
                    }
                });

                $(document).on('click', '.goToNazmExplen', function () {
                    console.log();
                    //$('.audioVedioMediaControlsTranslation').removeClass('audioVedioMediaControlsTranslationActive');
                    $('.poemPageContentBody .e').toggleClass('showexplanation');
                    $('.audioVedioMediaControlsExplanation').toggleClass('audioVedioMediaControlsExplanationActive');

                    $('html,body').animate({
                        scrollTop: $('.e').offset().top - ttlHt - 64
                    }, 1000);
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }
            try {
                $("mark").each(function () {
                    var cwmVl = $(this).attr("cwm");
                        $(this).append('<span class="cwmTooltip">' + cwmVl + '</span>');
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }

        });


        var pContentId = "5c321e76-1b84-4c97-8d29-5210753f3089";
        var paraInfo = null;
        var fpMappings = null;
        var fpParaMappings = null;
        //todo:remove
		var firstParaInfo = "{\"P\":[{\"L\":[],\"T\":[],\"E\":[]}],\"CH\":\"\",\"CTH\":\"\",\"TT\":false}";
        var pgUrl = "https://www.rekhta.org/stories/haq-ki-fikr-premchand-stories?lang=hi";

        var isDefaultTranslation = false;
        var isContentAvailable = 'False';

        var isDefaultExplanation = 'false';

        var google_conversion_id = 962755924;
        var google_custom_params = window.google_tag_params;
        var google_remarketing_only = true;
        /* ]]> */

                    //$('.audioVedioMediaControlsExplanation').removeClass('audioVedioMediaControlsExplanationActive');
                    console.log('hi');
                    if ($('.showTranslation .t').hasClass('t')) {
                        $('html,body').animate({
                            scrollTop: $('.showTranslation .t').first().offset().top - ttlHt - 64
                        }, 1000);
                    }
                });

                $(document).on('click', '.goToNazmExplen', function () {
                    console.log();
                    //$('.audioVedioMediaControlsTranslation').removeClass('audioVedioMediaControlsTranslationActive');
                    $('.poemPageContentBody .e').toggleClass('showexplanation');
                    $('.audioVedioMediaControlsExplanation').toggleClass('audioVedioMediaControlsExplanationActive');

                    $('html,body').animate({
                        scrollTop: $('.e').offset().top - ttlHt - 64
                    }, 1000);
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }
            try {
                $("mark").each(function () {
                    var cwmVl = $(this).attr("cwm");
                        $(this).append('<span class="cwmTooltip">' + cwmVl + '</span>');
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }

        });


        var pContentId = "96aa9fc4-9cf9-45be-a1ad-6a4b81f29299";
        var paraInfo = null;
        var fpMappings = null;
        var fpParaMappings = null;
        //todo:remove
		var firstParaInfo = "{\"P\":[{\"L\":[],\"T\":[],\"E\":[]}],\"CH\":\"\",\"CTH\":\"\",\"TT\":false}";
        var pgUrl = "https://www.rekhta.org/stories/aatma-raam-premchand-stories?lang=hi";

        var isDefaultTranslation = false;
        var isContentAvailable = 'False';

        var isDefaultExplanation = 'false';
    








        /* <![CDATA[ */
        var google_conversion_id = 962755924;
        var google_custom_params = window.google_tag_params;
        var google_remarketing_only = true;
        /* ]]> */
    










            !function (f, b, e, v, n, t, s) {
                if (f.fbq) return; n = f.fbq = function () {
                    n.callMethod ?
                        n.callMethod.apply(n, arguments) : n.queue.push(arguments)
                };
                if (!f._fbq) f._fbq = n; n.push = n; n.loaded = !0; n.version = '2.0';
                n.queue = []; t = b.createElement(e); t.async = !0;
                t.src = v; s = b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];
                s.parentNode.insertBefore(t, s)
            }(window, document, 'script',
                'https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');
            fbq('init', '1415782558565409');
            fbq('track', 'PageView');
        







            window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
            function gtag() { dataLayer.push(arguments); }
            gtag('js', new Date());
            gtag('config', 'AW-776429577');
        














बेटी का धन

        var bundleurls={lg:'https://rekhtacdn.azureedge.net/contents/lgmdsm_hi?v=-L5ep4634VcSL6cO2GzSlIvyjrmViR6aDK8zgbx3ccE1', md:'https://rekhtacdn.azureedge.net/contents/mdsm_hi?v=YGq8oZ0R2UEe3NRxJ58l95jUrad9OjnDFnUKoJcEdf01', sm:'https://rekhtacdn.azureedge.net/contents/sm_hi?v=tRW3OHrBaMEXVfRPRREqK8uO66nyNmFTwIsPaYWrHEY1' };
        var favAddText = 'अपने फ़ेवरेट में शामिल कीजिए';
        var favRemText = 'फेवरेट से हटाइए';
        var websiteId =1;
        var maxAccessForRegistration = '5';

    










                (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
                    i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r; i[r] = i[r] || function () {
                        (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
                    }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date(); a = s.createElement(o),
                        m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0]; a.async = 1; a.src = g; m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
                })(window, document, 'script', 'https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

                ga('create', 'UA-37442234-1', 'auto');
                ga('send', 'pageview');
                function setGAUser(userId) {
                    ga('set', 'userId', userId); // Set the user ID using signed-in user_id.
                    gtag('set', { 'user_id': userId }); // Set the user ID using signed-in user_id
                }

        $(document).ready(function () {
            if (window.hasOwnProperty('webkitSpeechRecognition') || window.hasOwnProperty('SpeechRecognition')) {
                $(".voiceSearchIcon").show();
                $(".searchBtn").hide();
            }
            else {
                $(".voiceSearchIcon").hide();
                $(".searchBtn").show();
            }
        });

    




        $(document).ready(function () {
            try {
                var hdrHt = $('.navigation').height();
                var pnlHt = $('.shareMediaControlWithoutMedia').height();
                var ttlHt = hdrHt + pnlHt;
                $(document).on('click','.goToNazmTrnslt', function () {
                    //$('.audioVedioMediaControlsExplanation').removeClass('audioVedioMediaControlsExplanationActive');
                    console.log('hi');
                    if ($('.showTranslation .t').hasClass('t')) {
                        $('html,body').animate({
                            scrollTop: $('.showTranslation .t').first().offset().top - ttlHt - 64
                        }, 1000);
                    }
                });

                $(document).on('click', '.goToNazmExplen', function () {
                    console.log();
                    //$('.audioVedioMediaControlsTranslation').removeClass('audioVedioMediaControlsTranslationActive');
                    $('.poemPageContentBody .e').toggleClass('showexplanation');
                    $('.audioVedioMediaControlsExplanation').toggleClass('audioVedioMediaControlsExplanationActive');

                    $('html,body').animate({
                        scrollTop: $('.e').offset().top - ttlHt - 64
                    }, 1000);
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }
            try {
                $("mark").each(function () {
                    var cwmVl = $(this).attr("cwm");
                        $(this).append('<span class="cwmTooltip">' + cwmVl + '</span>');
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }

        });

An Urdu karwaan tracing the roots of the Language









Shaam-e-Rekhta
A Poetic/Musical evening of Urdu saga








        $(document).ready(function () {
            if (window.hasOwnProperty('webkitSpeechRecognition') || window.hasOwnProperty('SpeechRecognition')) {
                $(".voiceSearchIcon").show();
                $(".searchBtn").hide();
            }
            else {
                $(".voiceSearchIcon").hide();
                $(".searchBtn").show();
            }
        });

    




        $(document).ready(function () {
            try {
                var hdrHt = $('.navigation').height();
                var pnlHt = $('.shareMediaControlWithoutMedia').height();
                var ttlHt = hdrHt + pnlHt;
                $(document).on('click','.goToNazmTrnslt', function () {
                    //$('.audioVedioMediaControlsExplanation').removeClass('audioVedioMediaControlsExplanationActive');
                    console.log('hi');
                    if ($('.showTranslation .t').hasClass('t')) {
                        $('html,body').animate({
                            scrollTop: $('.showTranslation .t').first().offset().top - ttlHt - 64
                        }, 1000);
                    }
                });

                $(document).on('click', '.goToNazmExplen', function () {
                    console.log();
                    //$('.audioVedioMediaControlsTranslation').removeClass('audioVedioMediaControlsTranslationActive');
                    $('.poemPageContentBody .e').toggleClass('showexplanation');
                    $('.audioVedioMediaControlsExplanation').toggleClass('audioVedioMediaControlsExplanationActive');

                    $('html,body').animate({
                        scrollTop: $('.e').offset().top - ttlHt - 64
                    }, 1000);
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }
            try {
                $("mark").each(function () {
                    var cwmVl = $(this).attr("cwm");
                        $(this).append('<span class="cwmTooltip">' + cwmVl + '</span>');
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }

        });


        var pContentId = "9cd15beb-3ebb-46ed-92c6-a9ee2394908b";
        var paraInfo = null;
        var fpMappings = null;
        var fpParaMappings = null;
        //todo:remove
		var firstParaInfo = "{\"P\":[{\"L\":[],\"T\":[],\"E\":[]}],\"CH\":\"\",\"CTH\":\"\",\"TT\":false}";
        var pgUrl = "https://www.rekhta.org/stories/nok-jhonk-premchand-stories?lang=hi";

        var isDefaultTranslation = false;
        var isContentAvailable = 'False';

        var isDefaultExplanation = 'false';
    








        /* <![CDATA[ */
        var google_conversion_id = 962755924;
        var google_custom_params = window.google_tag_params;
        var google_remarketing_only = true;
        /* ]]> */
    










            !function (f, b, e, v, n, t, s) {
                if (f.fbq) return; n = f.fbq = function () {
                    n.callMethod ?
                        n.callMethod.apply(n, arguments) : n.queue.push(arguments)
                };
                if (!f._fbq) f._fbq = n; n.push = n; n.loaded = !0; n.version = '2.0';
                n.queue = []; t = b.createElement(e); t.async = !0;
                t.src = v; s = b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];
                s.parentNode.insertBefore(t, s)
            }(window, document, 'script',
                'https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');
            fbq('init', '1415782558565409');
            fbq('track', 'PageView');
        







            window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
            function gtag() { dataLayer.push(arguments); }
            gtag('js', new Date());
            gtag('config', 'AW-776429577');
        














ये मेरी मादर-ए-वतन है!
























        var startDt = Date.now();
        var userEvts = [];
        var currentLanguage = '2';
        // init values
       var requestPath ='/stories/ye-meri-madar-e-watan-hai-premchand-stories';
        var lang=2;
        var rWorld= 'https://world.rekhta.org';
        var cardsUrl = 'https://rekhtacards.azureedge.net';
        var bundleurls={lg:'https://rekhtacdn.azureedge.net/contents/lgmdsm_hi?v=-L5ep4634VcSL6cO2GzSlIvyjrmViR6aDK8zgbx3ccE1', md:'https://rekhtacdn.azureedge.net/contents/mdsm_hi?v=YGq8oZ0R2UEe3NRxJ58l95jUrad9OjnDFnUKoJcEdf01', sm:'https://rekhtacdn.azureedge.net/contents/sm_hi?v=tRW3OHrBaMEXVfRPRREqK8uO66nyNmFTwIsPaYWrHEY1' };
        var favAddText = 'अपने फ़ेवरेट में शामिल कीजिए';
        var favRemText = 'फेवरेट से हटाइए';
        var websiteId =1;
        var maxAccessForRegistration = '5';

    










                (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
                    i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r; i[r] = i[r] || function () {
                        (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
                    }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date(); a = s.createElement(o),
                        m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0]; a.async = 1; a.src = g; m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
                })(window, document, 'script', 'https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

                ga('create', 'UA-37442234-1', 'auto');
                ga('send', 'pageview');
                function setGAUser(userId) {
                    ga('set', 'userId', userId); // Set the user ID using signed-in user_id.
                    gtag('set', { 'user_id': userId }); // Set the user ID using signed-in user_id
                }

            



















ये मेरी मादर-ए-वतन है!

प्रेमचंद












ये मेरी मादर-ए-वतन है!
प्रेमचंद

An Urdu karwaan tracing the roots of the Language









Shaam-e-Rekhta
A Poetic/Musical evening of Urdu saga









HI 

EN
HI
UR




























DONATE TO REKHTA












30,000+ ग़ज़लों, 20,000+ शेर, 40,000+ ई-पुस्तकों में तलाश कीजिए

आपकी खोज और इनपुट पर आधारित क्विक-सुझाव



सभी परिणाम देखिए















Rekhta Foundation
Devoted to the preservation & promotion of Urdu









AAMOZISH
The best way to learn Urdu online









Sufinama
Online Treasure of Sufi and Sant Poetry









Qaafiya
Online Urdu poetry resource for aspiring young poets









Jashn-e-Rekhta
A three-day celebration of Urdu 









Rang-e-Rekhta
An Urdu karwaan tracing the roots of the Language









Shaam-e-Rekhta
A Poetic/Musical evening of Urdu saga








        $(document).ready(function () {
            if (window.hasOwnProperty('webkitSpeechRecognition') || window.hasOwnProperty('SpeechRecognition')) {
                $(".voiceSearchIcon").show();
                $(".searchBtn").hide();
            }
            else {
                $(".voiceSearchIcon").hide();
                $(".searchBtn").show();
            }
        });

    




        $(document).ready(function () {
            try {
                var hdrHt = $('.navigation').height();
                var pnlHt = $('.shareMediaControlWithoutMedia').height();
                var ttlHt = hdrHt + pnlHt;
                $(document).on('click','.goToNazmTrnslt', function () {
                    //$('.audioVedioMediaControlsExplanation').removeClass('audioVedioMediaControlsExplanationActive');
                    console.log('hi');
                    if ($('.showTranslation .t').hasClass('t')) {
                        $('html,body').animate({
                            scrollTop: $('.showTranslation .t').first().offset().top - ttlHt - 64
                        }, 1000);
                    }
                });

                $(document).on('click', '.goToNazmExplen', function () {
                    console.log();
                    //$('.audioVedioMediaControlsTranslation').removeClass('audioVedioMediaControlsTranslationActive');
                    $('.poemPageContentBody .e').toggleClass('showexplanation');
                    $('.audioVedioMediaControlsExplanation').toggleClass('audioVedioMediaControlsExplanationActive');

                    $('html,body').animate({
                        scrollTop: $('.e').offset().top - ttlHt - 64
                    }, 1000);
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }
            try {
                $("mark").each(function () {
                    var cwmVl = $(this).attr("cwm");
                        $(this).append('<span class="cwmTooltip">' + cwmVl + '</span>');
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }

        });


        var pContentId = "9c483561-8dbd-4106-bfc9-b13e9adaff3f";
        var paraInfo = null;
        var fpMappings = null;
        var fpParaMappings = null;
        //todo:remove
		var firstParaInfo = "{\"P\":[{\"L\":[],\"T\":[],\"E\":[]}],\"CH\":\"\",\"CTH\":\"\",\"TT\":false}";
        var pgUrl = "https://www.rekhta.org/stories/khanjar-o-wafa-premchand-stories?lang=hi";

        var isDefaultTranslation = false;
        var isContentAvailable = 'False';

        var isDefaultExplanation = 'false';
    








        /* <![CDATA[ */
        var google_conversion_id = 962755924;
        var google_custom_params = window.google_tag_params;
        var google_remarketing_only = true;
        /* ]]> */
    










            !function (f, b, e, v, n, t, s) {
                if (f.fbq) return; n = f.fbq = function () {
                    n.callMethod ?
                        n.callMethod.apply(n, arguments) : n.queue.push(arguments)
                };
                if (!f._fbq) f._fbq = n; n.push = n; n.loaded = !0; n.version = '2.0';
                n.queue = []; t = b.createElement(e); t.async = !0;
                t.src = v; s = b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];
                s.parentNode.insertBefore(t, s)
            }(window, document, 'script',
                'https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');
            fbq('init', '1415782558565409');
            fbq('track', 'PageView');
        







            window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
            function gtag() { dataLayer.push(arguments); }
            gtag('js', new Date());
            gtag('config', 'AW-776429577');
        














राह-ए-ख़िदमत
























        var startDt = Date.now();
        var userEvts = [];
        var currentLanguage = '2';
        // init values
       var requestPath ='/stories/raah-e-khidmat-premchand-stories';
        var lang=2;
        var rWorld= 'https://world.rekhta.org';
        var cardsUrl = 'https://rekhtacards.azureedge.net';
        var bundleurls={lg:'https://rekhtacdn.azureedge.net/contents/lgmdsm_hi?v=-L5ep4634VcSL6cO2GzSlIvyjrmViR6aDK8zgbx3ccE1', md:'https://rekhtacdn.azureedge.net/contents/mdsm_hi?v=YGq8oZ0R2UEe3NRxJ58l95jUrad9OjnDFnUKoJcEdf01', sm:'https://rekhtacdn.azureedge.net/contents/sm_hi?v=tRW3OHrBaMEXVfRPRREqK8uO66nyNmFTwIsPaYWrHEY1' };
        var favAddText = 'अपने फ़ेवरेट में शामिल कीजिए';
        var favRemText = 'फेवरेट से हटाइए';
        var websiteId =1;
        var maxAccessForRegistration = '5';

    










                (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
                    i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r; i[r] = i[r] || function () {
                        (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
                    }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date(); a = s.createElement(o),
                        m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0]; a.async = 1; a.src = g; m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
                })(window, document, 'script', 'https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

                ga('create', 'UA-37442234-1', 'auto');
                ga('send', 'pageview');
                function setGAUser(userId) {
                    ga('set', 'userId', userId); // Set the user ID using signed-in user_id.
                    gtag('set', { 'user_id': userId }); // Set the user ID using signed-in user_id
                }

            



















राह-ए-ख़िदमत

प्रेमचंद












राह-ए-ख़िदमत
प्रेमचंद










MORE BY प्रेमचंद





























यह पृष्ठ केवल निम्न लिपियों में उपलब्ध है
उर्दू

सहयोग
क़ाफ़िया

The best way to learn Urdu online

Online Treasure of Sufi and Sant Poetry









Qaafiya
Online Urdu poetry resource for aspiring young poets









Jashn-e-Rekhta
A three-day celebration of Urdu 









Rang-e-Rekhta
An Urdu karwaan tracing the roots of the Language









Shaam-e-Rekhta
A Poetic/Musical evening of Urdu saga

DONATE TO REKHTA












30,000+ ग़ज़लों, 20,000+ शेर, 40,000+ ई-पुस्तकों में तलाश कीजिए

आपकी खोज और इनपुट पर आधारित क्विक-सुझाव



सभी परिणाम देखिए















Rekhta Foundation
Devoted to the preservation & promotion of Urdu

        $(document).ready(function () {
            if (window.hasOwnProperty('webkitSpeechRecognition') || window.hasOwnProperty('SpeechRecognition')) {
                $(".voiceSearchIcon").show();
                $(".searchBtn").hide();
            }
            else {
                $(".voiceSearchIcon").hide();
                $(".searchBtn").show();
            }
        });

    




        $(document).ready(function () {
            try {
                var hdrHt = $('.navigation').height();
                var pnlHt = $('.shareMediaControlWithoutMedia').height();
                var ttlHt = hdrHt + pnlHt;
                $(document).on('click','.goToNazmTrnslt', function () {
                    //$('.audioVedioMediaControlsExplanation').removeClass('audioVedioMediaControlsExplanationActive');
                    console.log('hi');
                    if ($('.showTranslation .t').hasClass('t')) {
                        $('html,body').animate({
                            scrollTop: $('.showTranslation .t').first().offset().top - ttlHt - 64
                        }, 1000);
                    }
                });

                $(document).on('click', '.goToNazmExplen', function () {
                    console.log();
                    //$('.audioVedioMediaControlsTranslation').removeClass('audioVedioMediaControlsTranslationActive');
                    $('.poemPageContentBody .e').toggleClass('showexplanation');
                    $('.audioVedioMediaControlsExplanation').toggleClass('audioVedioMediaControlsExplanationActive');

                    $('html,body').animate({
                        scrollTop: $('.e').offset().top - ttlHt - 64
                    }, 1000);
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }
            try {
                $("mark").each(function () {
                    var cwmVl = $(this).attr("cwm");
                        $(this).append('<span class="cwmTooltip">' + cwmVl + '</span>');
                });
            } catch (e) {

            }

        });


        var pContentId = "e2b5bd1f-57dd-4a91-93df-80f1727c8ab4";
        var paraInfo = null;
        var fpMappings = null;
        var fpParaMappings = null;
        //todo:remove
		var firstParaInfo = "{\"P\":[{\"L\":[],\"T\":[],\"E\":[]}],\"CH\":\"\",\"CTH\":\"\",\"TT\":false}";
        var pgUrl = "https://www.rekhta.org/stories/ghairat-ki-kataar-premchand-stories?lang=hi";

        var isDefaultTranslation = false;
        var isContentAvailable = 'False';

        var isDefaultExplanation = 'false';
    








        /* <![CDATA[ */
        var google_conversion_id = 962755924;
        var google_custom_params = window.google_tag_params;
        var google_remarketing_only = true;
        /* ]]> */
    










            !function (f, b, e, v, n, t, s) {
                if (f.fbq) return; n = f.fbq = function () {
                    n.callMethod ?
                        n.callMethod.apply(n, arguments) : n.queue.push(arguments)
                };
                if (!f._fbq) f._fbq = n; n.push = n; n.loaded = !0; n.version = '2.0';
                n.queue = []; t = b.createElement(e); t.async = !0;
                t.src = v; s = b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];
                s.parentNode.insertBefore(t, s)
            }(window, document, 'script',
                'https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');
            fbq('init', '1415782558565409');
            fbq('track', 'PageView');
        







            window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
            function gtag() { dataLayer.push(arguments); }
            gtag('js', new Date());
            gtag('config', 'AW-776429577');

                (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
                    i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r; i[r] = i[r] || function () {
                        (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
                    }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date(); a = s.createElement(o),

                function setGAUser(userId) {
                    ga('set', 'userId', userId); // Set the user ID using signed-in user_id.
                    gtag('set', { 'user_id': userId }); // Set the user ID using signed-in user_id
                }
